## Installation

- Download the release JAR: `KymoButler4IJ_.jar`
- Copy to `Fiji.app/plugins/`
- Ensure dependency JARs exist in `Fiji.app/plugins/jars` (see `INSTALLATION.md`)
- Restart Fiji

## Configuration

Open `Plugins > KymoButler for ImageJ > Options` and set:

- `Use_local_Wolfram_Engine` = checked
- `WolframScript_path`
- `KymoButler_local_path`
- `Target_device` = GPU or CPU
